title: SOLD 1888 hall sporting times cigar trade card ny giants 4 sale
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: SOLD 1888 hall sporting times cigar trade card ny giants 4 sale
posts.post_content:
This large trade card was one of a handful that were found and have since been absorbed by the marketplace. I contacted Rex Stark a few years ago and he told me that he no longer had any for sale. ALL the cards from the find had varying degrees of use/damage. This one was apparently among the better half of those found - better condition ones are out there - but they come with a much higher price-point if you can get someone to sell you one. It does have some obvious faults as seen in my scans. Measures about 7 1/2" x 4 1/2". NO creases or pinholes.

800.00 paypal gift or check/MO. First email confirmation gets it...............
willing to trade for cards to complete my N162 and/or N184 sets and I need an N28 Ward.

posts.post_content: I was contacted to buy the card. I cannot manage to get any communication from John - so - if there are other interested parties it's still for sale

Henry....Emailed you my phone number. Let me know if you got it. Thanks, John McLean (we go way back - from PA)
seems same address as before - maybe in your spam? If I don't get an email response - I'll try and ring you tomorrow...............

If you want you can try this email to see if it gets thru [url]tjbuchner@hotmail.com[/url]. Look forward to talking to you again. Thanks, John

Henry....Just wanted to thank you for the card that arrived today (great service). It took me longer to open the package than it did for it to arrive! When I finally got to it, it was well worth the wait, very pleased with it (thanks for getting it to me safe).
